metadata.title: BioSmalltalk: A pure object system and library for bioinformatics
metadata.abstract: Summary: We have developed BioSmalltalk, a new environment system for pure object-oriented bioinformatics programming. Adaptive end-user programming systems tend to become more important for discovering biological knowledge, as is demonstrated by the emergence of open-source programming toolkits for bioinformatics in the past years. Our software is intended to bridge the gap between bioscientists and rapid software prototyping while preserving the possibility of scaling to whole-system biology applications. BioSmalltalk performs better in terms of execution time and memory usage than Biopython and BioPerl for some classical situations. © The Author 2013.

description: An Open source library that enables to build bioinformatics scripts and applications using Smalltalk programming environment, which is designed for users with little or no experience in programming.
name: BioSmalltalk
